body_html: I found tutorial to build TensorFlow 1.3.0 as a standalone project. After we build the project to be standalone project we only need regular g++ to compile our tensorflow project. I even shared my own tensorflow standalone project on github
body_text: I found tutorial to  build TensorFlow 1.3.0 as a standalone project. After we build the project to be standalone project we only need regular g++ to compile our tensorflow project. I even shared my own tensorflow standalone project on github
body: I found [tutorial](http://tuatini.me/building-tensorflow-as-a-standalone-project/) to  build TensorFlow 1.3.0 as a standalone project. After we build the project to be standalone project we only need regular g++ to compile our tensorflow project. I even shared [my own tensorflow standalone project on github](https://github.com/kikirizki/tensorflow-nobazel)
